sourcesContent:
<script>
    import configuratorAPI from '@/configurator/configuratorAPI'
    import sketchfabdata from '@/data/sketchfabdata'

    export default {
        name: 'player',
        components: {},
        props: {},
        computed: {
            playerIsInteractive() {
                return this.$store.state.ui.playerIsInteractive;
            },
            noPlayer() {
                return !window.config.player;
            },
            image(){
                if (this.noPlayer) {
                    return 'url(assets/img/background.png)'
                } else {
                    return '';
                }
            }
        },
        methods: {
            loadScene () {
                const sceneui = this.$store.state.model;
                configuratorAPI.load(sceneui, sketchfabdata.playersettings).then(api => {
                    configuratorAPI.addSlides(this.$store.state.slides.all);
                    configuratorAPI.disableSlides(this.$store.state.disabledslides.all);
                })
            },
        },
        mounted () {
            if (window.config.player) {
                this.loadScene()
            }
        }
    }
</script>


<template>
    <iframe
        id="player__iframe"
        :class="{'player--not-responsive': !playerIsInteractive }"
        :style="{'background-image': image}"
        class="player"/>
</template>


<style lang="scss">
    @import '@/styles/variables.scss';

    .player {
        background-size: cover;
        background-position: 50% 50%;
        border-width: 0;
        pointer-events: all;
        background-color: #444;

        &.player--not-responsive {
            pointer-events: none;
        }

    }
</style>
